",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-md","children":"At Alibaba, technical positions range from P5 to P10, with each level corresponding to different responsibilities and capability requirements.
P5 is an entry-level executor, mainly responsible for completing specific tasks, learning and growing under guidance;
P6 is an independent contributor, able to solve problems autonomously and deliver module-level work results; P7 begins to undertake more complex system design and project advancement, becoming a technical backbone in the team;
P8 needs to have architectural capabilities, lead the implementation of large projects, and form influence in their domain;
P9 is a technical expert or manager, responsible for cross-team strategic planning and resource integration, driving business innovation;
And P10, as an industry leader, must not only lead technical direction within the company but also set benchmarks in the industry, bringing profound technical and business value to the organization.
